attributes.action: Outlaw profanities being projected at a loud volume down residential streets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Lately in my area there have been a couple of teenagers who act very immature and shout profanities constantly.  These people shall remain nameless but I think this is an outrage and it should be stopped.  Please follow my petition and we can stop these boys from harming our community,
